Text: RE Exact legal entity for ISDA Cc Olivia Original Message From mailto Sent September To lobalAdvisorscouk Cc Subject Exact legal entity for ISDA The entity should be Enron North America Corp but Ive copied Sara Shackleton who is our inhouse attorney in case Im wrong Sara please let me know if anything has changed regarding the trading name we use Thanks With best regards Per Embedded Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp image moved to file From Olivia Bernard picpcx lobalAdvisorscouk AM Please respond to lobalAdvisorscouk To Per Sekse cc Subject Exact legal entity Dear Per Is Enron North America the exact legal entity we should set the ISDA with Cheers Olivia Bernard Business Manager Global Advisors Limited One Curzon Street th floor London WY FN fx lobalAdvisorscouk
